url: Provide the URL for the job application form. Example: https://www.paznaun-ischgl.com/en/crew/jobs/jobs?categories%5B%5D=8524459&categories%5B%5D=174928&categories%5B%5D=174946&categories%5B%5D=174980&categories%5B%5D=174964&categories%5B%5D=175128&categories%5B%5D=174955&categories%5B%5D=175048&categories%5B%5D=175120&categories%5B%5D=8524541&categories%5B%5D=8524529&categories%5B%5D=176233&seasons%5B%5D=winter&employmentTypes%5B%5D=8446243&search=&regions%5B%5D=
salutation: Your salutation (e.g., Mr, Mrs, Ms, Dr, etc.)
date_of_birth: Enter your birth date in ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD). Example: 1996-05-19
phone: Enter your phone number with country code. Example: +1 123-456-7890
email: Enter your email address. Example: yourname@example.com
street: Enter your street name. Example: Main Street
street_number: Enter your house or apartment number. Example: 123
zip: Enter your postal or ZIP code. Example: 12345
city: Enter your city. Example: New York
cover_letter: Write the text of your cover letter. Example: 'I am excited to apply for the position of...'
